Mashup.name: Github.Home
Mashup.mashupContent: { "RunTimePermissions" : { }, "UI" : { "Widgets" : [ { "Widgets" : [ { "Widgets" : [ { "Widgets" : [ { "Widgets" : [ ], "Properties" : { "Left" : 10, "ResponsiveLayout" : false, "ShowDataLoading" : true, "Z-index" : 10, "Text" : "Getting Started", "__TypeDisplayName" : "Label", "ToolTipField" : "", "Type" : "label", "Area" : "UI", "Alignment" : "left", "Top" : 15, "Visible" : true, "DisplayName" : "Label-5", "Style" : "Github.LabelLarge", "Height" : 22, "Id" : "Label-5", "Width" : 215 } }, { "Widgets" : [ ], "Properties" : { "Left" : 30, "ResponsiveLayout" : false, "ShowDataLoading" : true, "Z-index" : 10, "Text" : "- If you are in a first time setup, press the Create New button on the top right to create a new connection to a Github Repository. Otherwise, select the Github configuration from the grid. ", "__TypeDisplayName" : "Label", "ToolTipField" : "", "Type" : "label", "Area" : "UI", "Alignment" : "left", "Top" : 50, "Visible" : true, "DisplayName" : "Label-10", "Style" : "Github.Label", "Height" : 67, "Id" : "Label-10", "Width" : 385 } }, { "Widgets" : [ ], "Properties" : { "Left" : 30, "ResponsiveLayout" : false, "ShowDataLoading" : true, "Z-index" : 10, "Text" : "- Once the github connection is made, you now need to associate the connection in ThingWorx to the repository in Github. Select from the dropdown otherwise press the Create Github Repository button.", "__TypeDisplayName" : "Label", "ToolTipField" : "", "Type" : "label", "Area" : "UI", "Alignment" : "left", "Top" : 124.99998474121094, "Visible" : true, "DisplayName" : "Label-12", "Style" : "Github.Label", "Height" : 77, "Id" : "Label-12", "Width" : 385 } }, { "Widgets" : [ ], "Properties" : { "Left" : 30, "ResponsiveLayout" : false, "ShowDataLoading" : true, "Z-index" : 10, "Text" : "- Now you need to indicate in ThingWorx, what application tags you want to export to Github. Press the tags button to select those tags and then press Update Configuration. ", "__TypeDisplayName" : "Label", "ToolTipField" : "", "Type" : "label", "Area" : "UI", "Alignment" : "left", "Top" : 200, "Visible" : true, "DisplayName" : "Label-71", "Style" : "Github.Label", "Height" : 77, "Id" : "Label-71", "Width" : 385 } }, { "Widgets" : [ ], "Properties" : { "Left" : 30, "ResponsiveLayout" : false, "ShowDataLoading" : true, "Z-index" : 10, "Text" : "- Once you update the configuration, any changes made to any entity tagged with the tags selected in the configuration will be uploaded to Github on a timing basis. There are two different settings that can be made. First is the GithubScheduler. This schedule is what controls how often the server looks for changes and exports the data. This defaults to look every 2 minutes. The next is a timer called GithubTimer. This defaults to once a minute and will transfer the files from the export to Github. If you want to make changes, go to Composer to make these changes. ", "__TypeDisplayName" : "Label", "ToolTipField" : "", "Type" : "label", "Area" : "UI", "Alignment" : "left", "Top" : 274.99998474121094, "Visible" : true, "DisplayName" : "Label-72", "Style" : "Github.Label", "Height" : 187, "Id" : "Label-72", "Width" : 385 } }, { "Widgets" : [ ], "Properties" : { "Left" : 25, "ResponsiveLayout" : false, "ShowDataLoading" : true, "Z-index" : 10, "Text" : "- You can apply a version tag to all entities that are tagged with the above marked tag for this repository. If you tag with a version tag, the version will show in Github as well as the comments entered in ThingWorx on save. If the only thing you have done is add a version tag, you will need to perform a full export to export all entities with that version tag.", "__TypeDisplayName" : "Label", "ToolTipField" : "", "Type" : "label", "Area" : "UI", "Alignment" : "left", "Top" : 504.99998474121094, "Visible" : true, "DisplayName" : "Label-77", "Style" : "Github.Label", "Height" : 142, "Id" : "Label-77", "Width" : 385 } }, { "Widgets" : [ ], "Properties" : { "Left" : 25, "ResponsiveLayout" : false, "ShowDataLoading" : true, "Z-index" : 10, "Text" : "- You may also want to perform a full export the first time this Github package is loaded onto a ThingWorx server since the normal process is only looking for changes to be exported and uploaded.", "__TypeDisplayName" : "Label", "ToolTipField" : "", "Type" : "label", "Area" : "UI", "Alignment" : "left", "Top" : 654.9999542236328, "Visible" : true, "DisplayName" : "Label-78", "Style" : "Github.Label", "Height" : 92, "Id" : "Label-78", "Width" : 385 } } ],
